TextView.android:text: Start of Shift:
Bring down all matts, fruit, straws and steels. Prepare for a busy shift
Turn on all lights and neon signs
Marry glassware and bring down extra glass depending on special for today
Trash cans are empty and put back in determined spots
Wipe down the Bar and put all bar stools out
Fill wells with ice
Chillers are stocked
Make sure server is well prepared with everything that they might need for day part
Ask manager if there is anything else they would like done
During Shift (All shifts):
Keep all wells full of ice
Keep bar top clean
Organize/stock wells and chillers.
Continue to stock beer tubs
Continue to stock red bull
Organize money and make 20 stacks
Stock straws, napkins, and glassware
Keep bar clean and organized
Happy Hour:
Bar should ne completely clean, organized, stocked, and ready for next shift and bartender. Next bartender should be completely set-up and ready to serve.
Check out with incoming bartender and manager
Banks and checkouts turned in to the manager
Wait for manager to count your bank if available
Clock out (your shift is not done until bar is completely ready)
Marry Glassware
Clean well bottles, burn and sanitize all wells
Wipe doen all liquor bottles and put in correct spot, organized, and marry duplicates
Marry, restock, wipe down chillers and liquor bottles
Clean beer grate and under pints with a pitcher if hot water and completely dry off
Clean soda gun and holsters
Restock well liquor
Clean mirror behind the bar with Windex and paper towels(if you are at new bar)
Dump ice, replace bus tubs, and straighten bottle beer tubs
Clean and wipe down all computers and hardware with water and towel
Clean and sanitize all bar top and back bar
Restock 32s
Bleach mop entire floor
Remove floor mats, trash cans, beer tubs and pick up floor
Make sure all glassware, mats and towels are bussed upstairs
Turn in radios to barback room
Tell management about anything broken and make sure bar is ready for open
